text: @CNN 🇯🇵Japan is currently crazy, and Prime Minister Shinzo Abe moves his intimate prosecutor, ignoring the law, in order to be indicted for criminal acts he has committed for his own protection  Force a Diet resolution to do so.  Coronavirus infection remains unresolved.
